name: Sex Vixens From Space
description: Dashing hero-heartthrob of the future Brad Stallion is assigned by the Federated Government to locate and neutralize "The Tribe" -- a band of space-Amazon raiders spreading interstellar terror with their emasculating Sex-ray guns.  With the assistance of Sandie, a shipboard computer, the player must guide Brad through two planetary environments, a space station, and his own streamlined vessel -- the Big Thruster.  As for the various women he will encounter in his journeys?  We'll put it this way: when you only have one tool at your disposal, every problem you encounter looks like a toolbox.
alsoFor: Amiga, Atari ST, DOS | Combined View
